summary.span: 表示 Windows 登錄中的機碼層級節點。

span.span: Represents a key-level node in the Windows registry.

summary.span: 這個類別的作用是登錄封裝。

span.span: This class is a registry encapsulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的執行個體，使用其中一個靜態成員類別。To get an instance of , use one of the static members of the class. 登錄做為電腦上的作業系統和應用程式資訊的中央儲存機制。The registry acts as a central repository of information for the operating system and the applications on a computer. 登錄依照階層格式，根據儲存在它的項目邏輯順序 (請參閱此階層中的基底層級項目)。The registry is organized in a hierarchical format, based on a logical ordering of the elements stored within it (please see for the base-level items in this hierarchy). 時將資訊儲存在登錄中，選取要儲存的資訊類型為基礎的適當位置。When storing information in the registry, select the appropriate location based on the type of information being stored. 請務必避免破壞其他應用程式所建立，因為這可能會導致出現未預期的行為，這些應用程式，也可以在自己的應用程式時產生負面影響的資訊。Be sure to avoid destroying information created by other applications, because this can cause those applications to exhibit unexpected behavior, and can also have an adverse effect upon your own application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 登錄機碼的基底的單位是在登錄中，組織和可以比較檔案總管 中的資料夾。Registry keys are the base unit of organization in the registry, and can be compared to folders in File Explorer. 特定的金鑰可以有子機碼，就像資料夾可以有子資料夾。A particular key can have subkeys, just as a folder can have subfolders. 可以刪除每個索引鍵，只要使用者擁有適當的權限才能這樣做，而且不是基底的索引鍵或層級之下的基底的索引鍵。Each key can be deleted, as long as the user has the appropriate permissions to do so, and the key is not a base key or at the level directly under the base keys. 每個索引鍵也可以有多個相關的值 （值可以相較於檔案），用來儲存資訊 — 例如，電腦上安裝應用程式的相關資訊。Each key can also have multiple values associated with it (a value can be compared to a file), which are used to store the information — for example, information about an application installed on the computer. 每個值會保存一段特定可以擷取或更新時所需的資訊。Each value holds one particular piece of information, which can be retrieved or updated when required. 比方說，您可以建立貴公司，在機碼 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software，然後針對您的公司會建立每個應用程式的子機碼。For instance, you can create a for your company, under the key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software, and then a subkey for each application that your company creates. 每個子機碼保存資訊專屬於該應用程式，色彩設定螢幕的位置和大小，例如，或識別檔案的副檔名。Each subkey holds the information specific to that application, such as color settings, screen location and size, or recognized file extensions. 請注意，儲存在登錄中的資訊可供其他應用程式和使用者，因此應該不會被用來儲存安全性資料或關鍵應用程式資訊。Note that information stored in the registry is available to other applications and users, and therefore should not be used to store security data or critical application information. > [!CAUTION] > 不會公開方式的一種惡意程式無法建立數千個無意義的子機碼或索引鍵/值組中的物件。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如，不允許呼叫者輸入任意索引鍵或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不再超過 255 個字元的登錄機碼長度。Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the length of a registry key is no longer limited to 255 characters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立在 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 下的子機碼，操作其內容，然後再刪除 子機碼。The following code example shows how to create a subkey under HKEY_CURRENT_USER, manipulate its contents, and then delete the subkey. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 如果其內容已經做了修改，請關閉機碼，並將它清除至磁碟中。

span.span: Closes the key and flushes it to disk if its contents have been modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系統機碼上呼叫這個方法不會影響，因為系統索引鍵永遠不會關閉。Calling this method on system keys will have no effect, because system keys are never closed. 如果您的執行個體上呼叫這個方法不做任何動作`RegistryKey`已關閉。This method does nothing if you call it on an instance of `RegistryKey` that is already closed. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/VB/source.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立具有所指定的存取控制的登錄機碼`registrySecurity`參數。The method creates a registry key that has the access control specified by the `registrySecurity` parameter. 物件，則會傳回代表登錄機碼，但不是會限制該物件中指定的存取控制`registrySecurity`參數。The object that is returned represents the registry key, but that object is not restricted by the access control specified in the `registrySecurity` parameter. 如果`permissionCheck`是，開啟機碼以進行讀取/寫入存取。If `permissionCheck` is , the key is opened for read/write access. 如果`permissionCheck`是，開啟機碼以供讀取存取。If `permissionCheck` is , the key is opened for read access. 回溯相容性，開啟機碼以進行讀取和寫入如果`permissionCheck`是和父索引鍵也有。For backward compatibility, the key is opened for reading and writing if `permissionCheck` is and the parent key also has . 如果父索引鍵中有任何其他設定，讀取/寫入狀態是由父索引鍵的設定所控制。If the parent key has any other setting, read/write status is controlled by the parent key's setting. 為了執行此動作，使用者必須在此層級和以下版本的權限登錄階層中。In order to perform this action, the user must have permissions at this level and below in the registry hierarchy. > [!CAUTION] > 不會公開方式的一種惡意程式無法建立數千個無意義的子機碼或索引鍵/值組中的物件。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如，不允許呼叫者輸入任意索引鍵或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. 若要使用方法，您必須擁有執行個體類別。In order to use the method, you must have an instance of the class. 若要取得的執行個體，使用其中一個靜態成員類別。To get an instance of , use one of the static members of the class.

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Flush ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Flush() cil managed
Public Sub Flush ()
public: void Flush();

summary.span: 將指定的開啟登錄機碼的所有屬性 (Attribute) 寫入登錄中。

span.span: Writes all the attributes of the specified open registry key into the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要呼叫`Flush`寫出機碼的變更。It is not necessary to call `Flush` to write out changes to a key. 登錄變更會排清到磁碟時登錄會使用其延遲的清除。Registry changes are flushed to disk when the registry uses its lazy flusher. 延遲排清，就會發生自動並定期在系統指定的時間間隔之後。Lazy flushing occurs automatically and regularly after a system-specified time interval. 登錄變更也會排清至磁碟的系統關機。Registry changes are also flushed to disk at system shutdown. 不同於、`Flush`函式的所有資料都寫入登錄時，才會傳回。Unlike , the `Flush` function returns only when all the data has been written to the registry. `Flush`函式也可能會寫出的部分或全部的索引鍵。The `Flush` function might also write out parts of or all of the other keys. 過度呼叫這個函式可以有應用程式效能的負面影響。Calling this function excessively can have a negative effect on an application's performance. 應用程式應該只呼叫`Flush`如果必須是絕對特定登錄變更會記錄至磁碟。An application should only call `Flush` if it must be absolute certain that registry changes are recorded to disk. 一般情況下，`Flush`很少，如果有的話，必須使用。In general, `Flush` rarely, if ever, need be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 登錄機碼可以有一個不是任何名稱相關聯的值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 當這個未命名的值顯示在登錄編輯程式中時，字串 「 （預設） 」 會顯示而不是名稱。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要擷取這個未命名的值，指定`null`或空字串 ("") 的`name`。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 當方法會擷取可擴充的字串值 ()，它會展開環境字串使用本機的環境中的資料。When the method retrieves expandable string values (), it expands environment strings using data from the local environment. 若要從遠端電腦上的登錄中擷取可擴充的字串值，請使用方法多載來指定您不要展開環境字串。To retrieve expandable string values from the registry on a remote computer, use the method overload to specify that you do not want environment strings expanded. > [!NOTE] > 如果值，其中包含可展開環境變數參考已儲存為字串 ()，而不是可擴充的字串 ()，不會展開。If a value containing expandable references to environment variables has been stored as a string (), rather than as an expandable string (), does not expand it. 已擷取透過呼叫之後，您可以展開此類字串方法。You can expand such a string after it has been retrieved by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 從中擷取資料的建議的方式金鑰是使用類別而非方法。The recommended way to retrieve data from the key is to use the class rather than the method. > > 不支援型別 REG_NONE 或 REG_LINK 讀取的值。 does not support reading values of type REG_NONE or REG_LINK. 在這兩種情況下，預設值 (`null`) 會傳回而不是實際的值。In both cases, the default value (`null`) is returned instead of the actual value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立測試金鑰，並將索引鍵的不同資料類型的值。The following code example creates a test key and adds values of different data types to the key. 此範例會讀取的名稱/值組，並加以顯示到主控台，使用方法來擷取對應的登錄資料類型。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to retrieve the corresponding registry data types. Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立測試金鑰值，並擷取該值。The following code example creates a test key with a value and retrieves that value. 然後此範例會嘗試擷取索引鍵不存在的值在此情況下方法會傳回指定的預設值。The example then attempts to retrieve a nonexistent value from the key; in this case the method returns the specified default value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個多載來指定擷取值的特殊處理。Use this overload to specify special processing of the retrieved value. 例如，您可以指定擷取類型的登錄值時擷取字串，而不會擴充內嵌的環境變數。For example, you can specify when retrieving a registry value of type to retrieve the string without expanding embedded environment variables. 使用`defaultValue`參數來指定要傳回的值`name`不存在。Use the `defaultValue` parameter to specify the value to return if `name` does not exist. > [!NOTE] > 登錄機碼可以有一個不是任何名稱相關聯的值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 當這個未命名的值顯示在登錄編輯程式中時，字串 「 （預設） 」 會顯示而不是名稱。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要擷取這個未命名的值，指定`null`或空字串 ("") 的`name`。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. > > 不支援型別 REG_NONE 或 REG_LINK 讀取的值。 does not support reading values of type REG_NONE or REG_LINK. 在這兩種情況下，預設值 (`null`) 會傳回而不是實際的值。In both cases, the default value (`null`) is returned instead of the actual value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立測試金鑰、 將值與內嵌的環境變數，並擷取展開和未展開的表單中的值。The following code sample creates a test key, adds a value with an embedded environment variable, and retrieves the value in both expanded and unexpanded forms. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要修改的登錄機碼的權限，請使用方法，以取得物件代表現有的 Windows 存取控制安全性，請修改物件，，然後使用方法，以更新的安全性索引鍵。To modify permissions for a registry key, use the method to obtain a object representing the existing Windows access control security, modify that object, and then use the method to update security for the key. > [!CAUTION] > 物件指定`registrySecurity`取代現有的安全性登錄機碼。The object specified for `registrySecurity` replaces the existing security for the registry key. 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用方法，以取得現有的存取控制安全性，然後再修改它。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing access control security, and then modify it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立測試金鑰。The following code example creates a test key. 目前的使用者允許和權但拒絕和權限。The current user is allowed and rights but denied and rights. 後續嘗試將管理金鑰成功或失敗，根據這些權限。Subsequent attempts to manipulate the key succeed or fail depending on these permissions. 刪除機碼之前，暫停程式碼。Before the key is deleted, the code pauses. 您可以切換至登錄編輯程式，並確認使用登錄編輯程式存取金鑰時，適用於相同的存取權限。You can switch to the registry editor and verify that the same access rights apply when the key is accessed using the registry editor. (這最適合如果您使用**RunAs**從命令列以沒有管理員權限的本機使用者身分執行登錄編輯程式和範例程式碼。(This works best if you use **RunAs** from the command line to run the registry editor and the sample code as a local user without administrator rights. 登錄編輯程式一律可讓系統管理員才能變更權限，即使特定的系統管理員遭到拒絕這些權限。The registry editor always allows an administrator to change permissions, even if the particular administrator has been denied those rights. 如果您已經定義名為 TestUser，命令的本機使用者`runas /user:TestUser cmd`會開啟登錄編輯程式，然後範例程式碼，您可以執行的命令視窗。)If you have defined a local user named TestUser, the command `runas /user:TestUser cmd` opens a command window from which you can run the registry editor and then the sample code.) remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為許多值可以儲存在登錄中的每個索引鍵中，您必須使用`name`參數來指定您想要設定的特定值。Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `name` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set. > [!NOTE] > 登錄機碼可以有一個不是任何名稱相關聯的值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 當這個未命名的值顯示在登錄編輯程式中時，字串 「 （預設） 」 會顯示而不是名稱。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要設定這個未命名的值，指定`null`或空字串 ("") 的`name`。To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 若要設定機碼中的值，您必須具有寫入存取開啟金鑰。In order to set values in a key, you must open the key with write access. 開啟索引鍵具有寫入存取權之後，您可以將該金鑰的名稱/值組的任何變更。After you have opened a key with write access, you can change any of the name/value pairs in that key. 如果指定`name`沒有索引鍵，就會建立和相關聯的值設定為`value`。If the specified `name` does not exist in the key, it is created and the associated value is set to `value`. 這個多載儲存為字串的 64 位元整數 ()。This overload of stores 64-bit integers as strings (). 若要儲存為 64 位元數字值，會使用指定的多載。To store 64-bit numbers as values, use the overload that specifies . 這個多載儲存所有的字串值，做為，即使它們包含可展開環境變數參考。This overload of stores all string values as , even if they contain expandable references to environment variables. 若要將字串值儲存為可展開的字串 ()，使用指定的多載。To save string values as expandable strings (), use the overload that specifies . 32 位元整數以外的數字類型會儲存為字串，此方法多載。Numeric types other than 32-bit integers are stored as strings by this method overload. 列舉項目會儲存成包含的項目名稱的字串。Enumeration elements are stored as strings containing the element names. > [!CAUTION] > 不會公開方式的一種惡意程式無法建立數千個無意義的子機碼或索引鍵/值組中的物件。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如，不允許呼叫者輸入任意索引鍵或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 上登錄不是 Unicode，而且並非所有的 Unicode 字元是有效的所有字碼頁。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 最佳可用相符項目取代目前的字碼頁而言是無效的 Unicode 字元。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不會擲回例外狀況。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何時它會設定值，方法會判斷登錄資料類型。The following code example shows how the method determines the registry data type when it sets values. 範例會建立測試金鑰，並將不同的資料類型的值加入至索引鍵。The example creates a test key and adds values of different data types to the key. 此範例會讀取的名稱/值組，並加以顯示到主控台，使用方法，以顯示對應的登錄資料類型。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to display the corresponding registry data types. change any of the name/value pairs in that key. 如果指定`name`沒有索引鍵，其建立，以及相關聯的值設定為`value`。If the specified `name` does not exist in the key, it is created, and the associated value is set to `value`. > [!NOTE] > 指定的登錄資料型別等同於使用多載。Specifying the registry data type is the same as using the overload. 如果指定的型別`value`不符合指定`valueKind`，且不能是資料轉換，就會擲回。If the type of the specified `value` does not match the specified `valueKind`, and the data cannot be converted, is thrown. 例如，您可以儲存為，但前提是它的值小於最大值。For example, you can store a as a , but only if its value is less than the maximum value of a . 您無法儲存成單一字串值。You cannot store a single string value as a . > [!NOTE] > 如果 boxed 的值會傳遞或，表示轉換已完成使用文化特性而異。If boxed values are passed for or , the conversion is done using the invariant culture. > [!CAUTION] > 不會公開方式的一種惡意程式無法建立數千個無意義的子機碼或索引鍵/值組中的物件。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如，不允許呼叫者輸入任意索引鍵或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 上登錄不是 Unicode，而且並非所有的 Unicode 字元是有效的所有字碼頁。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 最佳可用相符項目取代目前的字碼頁而言是無效的 Unicode 字元。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不會擲回例外狀況。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立測試金鑰，並使用方法來儲存數個值，指定每個值的登錄資料類型。The following code example creates a test key and uses the method to store several values, specifying the registry data type for each value. 此範例會讀取的名稱/值組，並加以顯示到主控台，使用方法，以顯示對應的登錄資料類型。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to display the corresponding registry data types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 64 位元版本的 Windows 中，登錄的一部分會分別儲存 32 位元和 64 位元應用程式。On the 64-bit versions of Windows, portions of the registry are stored separately for 32-bit and 64-bit applications. 沒有 32 位元應用程式的檢視 32 位元和 64 位元應用程式的 64 位元檢視。There is a 32-bit view for 32-bit applications and a 64-bit view for 64-bit applications. 不會假設檢視一律會對應的實際檢視。Do not assume that the view always corresponds to the actual view of the .
